Metadata.Title: Data Dictionary for the Unified Federal R&D Award Persistent Identifier System
Metadata.Description: Defines the metadata elements for a unified federal R&D Award PID system providing persistent, globally unique, resolvable URLs for all federal research and development awards.

Field.Name: award_pid
Field.Definition: The persistent, globally unique, resolvable URL assigned to the award.

Field.Name: award_uuid
Field.Definition: Internal UUID used for system-level uniqueness and canonical URL creation.

Field.Name: federal_award_identification_number
Field.Definition: Agency-submitted award identifier used for financial tracking and USAspending reporting.

Field.Name: agency_award_number
Field.Definition: The internal award number used by the funding agency.

Field.Name: san_number
Field.Definition: System Award Number or agency-specific structured award identifier.

Field.Name: title
Field.Definition: Official title of the research award.
Field.Example: Genomic Approaches to Understanding Disease Mechanisms

Field.Name: abstract
Field.Definition: Summary or project description provided by the awarding agency.

Field.Name: funding_agency
Field.Definition: Name of the federal agency providing funding for the award.

Field.Name: funding_agency_identifier
Field.Definition: Unique identifier for the funding agency.

Field.Name: funding_amount
Field.Definition: Total obligated funding amount.

Field.Name: start_date
Field.Definition: Official project start date.

Field.Name: end_date
Field.Definition: Official project end date.

Field.Name: principal_investigator_name
Field.Definition: Full name of the principal investigator.

Field.Name: principal_investigator_orcid
Field.Definition: ORCID identifier for the PI.

Field.Name: co_investigator
Field.Definition: Information on project co-investigators.

Field.Name: performing_organization_name
Field.Definition: Institution or organization carrying out the research.

Field.Name: performing_organization_ror
Field.Definition: Research Organization Registry (ROR) identifier.

Field.Name: related_research_outputs
Field.Definition: PIDs for related publications, datasets, software, and other outputs.

Field.Name: parent_award_pid
Field.Definition: PID for the parent award when the record represents a subaward.

Field.Name: subaward_pids
Field.Definition: List of PIDs representing subawards associated with this award.

Field.Name: co_funding_agencies
Field.Definition: Other federal agencies contributing funding support.

Field.Name: landing_page_url
Field.Definition: Human-readable landing page associated with the award PID.

Field.Name: metadata_last_updated
Field.Definition: Date of the most recent metadata update.

Field.Name: metadata_version
Field.Definition: Version number of the metadata record.
